trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_SEQ_00<tab>Stigma-4 has received a new directive to spice things up at the café.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with the alimentary survey unit.
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested ingredients to the alimentary survey unit.
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_SEQ_03<tab>Report to Stigma-4.
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the alimentary survey unit.

TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> from the Elysian seas.)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the alimentary survey unit.)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> from the Elysian seas.)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the alimentary survey unit.)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> from the Elysian seas.)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the alimentary survey unit.)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_TODO_02<tab>Report to Stigma-4.
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_STIGMA4_000_001<tab>The furry café owner has proposed a plan to secure more customers─a reconfiguration of the food directory.
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_STIGMA4_000_002<tab>Specifically, the creation of a food item comprised of materials from the Elysian seas and suited to Karellian proclivities has been requested.
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_STIGMA4_000_003<tab>Your assistance is required. Please report to the alimentary survey unit for further instruction.
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_OMICRON04620_000_004<tab>Provision supplier identified: <var 29 EB02 /var>. Loading entry for Karellian cuisine production...

TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_OMICRON04620_000_005<tab>Based on data from Karellian survey, certain diatom clusters have been determined to optimize “delectable” quotient while also promoting healthy digestion.
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_OMICRON04620_000_006<tab>Based on data from Karellian survey, certain rock moss has been determined to optimize “delectable” quotient while also promoting healthy digestion.

TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_OMICRON04620_000_007<tab>Based on data from Karellian survey, the aquatic organism colloquially referred to as “seaweed snapper” has been determined to optimize “delectable” quotient while also promoting healthy digestion.
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_OMICRON04620_000_008<tab>Use of gold salmon roe is strongly recommended for procurement. All proceeds go to Omicron enhancement initiatives.
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_OMICRON04620_000_009<tab>Please proceed to the marked area for acquisition. Prompt delivery is advised to ensure preservation of nutritional value.
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_OMICRON04620_000_010<tab>Loading directive... <whirr> Please procure diatom clusters to optimize “delectable” quotient and promote healthy digestion.
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_OMICRON04620_000_011<tab>Loading directive... <whirr> Please procure rock moss to optimize “delectable” quotient and promote healthy digestion.
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_OMICRON04620_000_012<tab>Loading directive... <whirr> Please procure seaweed snapper to optimize “delectable” quotient and promote healthy digestion.
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_OMICRON04620_000_013<tab>Prompt delivery is advised to ensure preservation of nutritional value. Please note that further delays may result in severe disappointment.
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_OMICRON04620_000_014<tab>Welcome back, <var 29 EB02 /var>. Please insert delivery to continue.
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_OMICRON04620_000_015<tab>Scanning... <whirr> Scanning... Quality of ingredients is acceptable. Delivery complete. Please return to Stigma-4 to receive compensation.
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_STIGMA4_000_016<tab>Return confirmed. Your timely delivery of goods has been noted and is greatly appreciated.
TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_STIGMA4_000_017<tab>This successful addition to the café's food directory should appease the fuzzy one for the time being.

TEXT_BANOMI114_04620_STIGMA4_000_018<tab><beep> Warning: extensive diversification of food directory likely to result in logistical errors. Standardization of customer digestive organs advised as the most efficient solution.
